source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_00<tab>Oboro glances impatiently about him, as if waiting for a tardy guest.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_00<tab>Oboro vous attendait avec impatience.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_01<tab>Having heard no word from Karasu since you last spoke, Oboro informs you that he has sent for Princess Yuki of the Yatsurugi clan, in hopes of reinforcing the ranks before setting out to rescue your friends. Despite her most enthusiastic response, however, the spirited princess has yet to arrive. You and Jacke take to the streets of Kugane in hopes of finding the girl before she runs afoul of any unsavory types.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_01<tab>Oboro a fait appel à Yuki, la princesse du clan Yatsurugi, pour essayer d'en savoir plus sur l'homme qui a engagé Zakuro et Karasu. Le ninja est inquiet, car la jeune femme aurait déjà dû arriver depuis longtemps. Peut-être s'est-elle perdue à Kugane<var 1D /var>? Rendez-vous à Kogane-dori pour tenter de la retrouver.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_02<tab>You find Princess Yuki hidden in an alley, desperately trying to avoid the gaze of Akagi, her retainer-turned-bodyguard who has pursued her to Kugane with the intent of bringing her home to her people. At the princess's behest, spin a harmless lie to throw her man off the scent.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retrouvé Yuki, qui a été suivie par Akagi jusqu'à Kugane. Elle est impatiente de pouvoir vous aider, mais ce sera impossible tant qu'elle ne sera pas libre de ses mouvements... Allez parler à Akagi pour tenter de l'éloigner.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_03<tab>You barely utter a few words when Akagi dashes off to board the next ship to Eorzea in search of the princess. Feeling somewhat guilty for taking advantage of the well-meaning but less-than-sharp-witted retainer, you console yourself with the knowledge that you have served the princess well.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez fait croire à Akagi que Yuki avait déjà quitté Kugane. Celui-ci s'est im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment mis en route pour Éorzéa dans l'espoir de retrouver sa princesse. Le pauvre n'a pas fini de courir... Allez annoncer la nouvelle à Yuki.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_04<tab>Though she regrets having asked you to tell a lie, Princess Yuki is grateful for your actions, for she can now repay both you and Oboro for your efforts on behalf of her and her kingdom. Eager to share what she has learned and begin the adventure, she dashes off to the piers to meet with Oboro as you follow in pursuit.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_04<tab>Yuki vous a expliqué qu'elle vous avait demandé d'éloigner Akagi car elle craignait en fait pour sa sécurité. Il est temps d'aller retrouver Oboro, à la jetée n°2.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_05<tab>Princess Yuki is sharing with you and Oboro her knowledge of Hingashi in hopes of identifying Karasu's mysterious employer, when your conversation is interrupted by the crow himself. He gleefully explains that he has prepared a “game” of sorts for you and your friends: you are to rescue your friends from the hideout of the Garnet League and claim the scroll as your prize, or fail and see your friends' lives forfeit. Having no choice but to submit to the eccentric shinobi's cruel and capricious demands, you and your friends set out for the Isle of Bekko.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_05<tab>Alors que vous étiez en train de converser avec Oboro et Yuki, Karasu est sou<var 16 /var>dai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment apparu pour vous expliquer ce que vous aurez à faire pour libérer vos camarades retenus prisonniers. Il semblerait que la seule façon de les sauver soit de vaincre Zakuro et ses hommes... Rendez-vous sur l'île de Bekko pour y retrouver Oboro et participer au “jeu” de Karasu.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_06<tab>After a long and hard-fought battle on the Isle of Bekko, you have felled the fearsome Zakuro Brightblood and rescued your Underfoot and the Stray from the Garnet League's clutches. All that remains is free Tsubame and claim the scroll for emerging triumphant in Karasu's game.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez réussi à libérer Perimu Haurimu et V'kebbe, et à vaincre Zakuro et ses hommes. Il ne reste plus qu'à sauver Tsubame, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_07<tab>Karasu, never to be trusted, is all too quick to renege on his promise and demand the spoils despite your clear victory according to the very conditions he set. With his friend and fellow shinobi's life in the balance, Oboro tosses the scroll to a gloating Karasu, who unceremoniously shoves Tsubame in your general direction. Karasu's enigmatic master then arrives on the scene, and with a few dismissive words, seemingly roasts Karasu to a husk with a breath of fire before your very eyes. Claiming to be Hanzo of the Kagekakushi clan─the only true practitioners of the art of ninjutsu─he ominously states his desire to rid the world of the descendants of “Sasuke the Shamed,” as he dismissively refers to the legendary progenitor of the Doman shinobi. As Oboro stands stunned, Tsubame comforts him with a secret entrusted to her by one her elders─namely, that the scroll in Hanzo's hands is but one half of the forbidden summoning mudra he covets. As Underfoot and V'kebbe return home to Limsa, you set out for Yanxia with Oboro, Tsubame, and Jacke, to inform the elders of all you have seen and glean what wisdom you might before planning your next action.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez été contraints de donner le parchemin à Karasu pour qu'il libère Tsubame. Il l'a alors remis à son employeur, Hanzo, le chef du clan Kagekakushi. En retour, le ninja de Hingashi a brûlé Karasu avant de disparaître aussi vite qu'il était arrivé... Malgré la gravité de la situation, Tsubame avait cependant une bonne nouvelle à vous annoncer<var 1D /var>: le parchemin emporté par Hanzo ne renferme en fait que la moitié de la technique d'invocation, le reste étant inscrit sur un second parchemin qui est toujours caché en lieu sûr, à Yanxia. Rendez-vous au village de Namai pour y retrouver Oboro.

source:
TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_08Upon arriving on the shores of Yanxia, you sojourn first in the fishing village of Namai. A clearly preoccupied Oboro states that he and Tsubame will make the trip from here to their village alone, as the elders may not take kindly to the presence of outsiders. The young shinobi promises you that they will return as soon as they are able, and you and Jacke resolve to keep your skills sharp in anticipation of the inevitable confrontation to come.

※The next ninja quest will be available from Jacke upon reaching level 68.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_SEQ_08Vous avez retrouvé Oboro, qui vous a demandé d'attendre à Namai pendant qu'il se rendait à son village en compagnie de Tsubame pour mettre au courant les anciens de la situation. Continuez à vous perfectionner en attendant leur retour.
* Jacke propose la prochaine quête aux ninja de niveau 68.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_100_000<tab>This Karasu's a dangerous rook, I reckon. It ain't like Underfoot and the Stray to be boned so easy-like.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_100_000<tab>Réussir à enlever V'kebbe et Perimu en même temps... Ce Karasu n'est pas n'importe qui.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_000<tab>Ah, it is good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have heard nothing from Karasu since last we met. It would seem we have no choice but to take matters into our own hand.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je voulais vous mettre au courant de la situation. Nous n'avons toujours pas de nouvelles de Karasu, mais ce n'est pas pour ça que nous nous reposons sur nos lauriers.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_001<tab>And yet, in our current state, we are outmanned. In hopes of bolstering our ranks, I reached out to Princess Yuki, pride of the Yatsurugi clan. Her skills and knowledge of these lands would surely avail us in our effort, I thought.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_001<tab>Pour en savoir plus sur l'homme qui emploie Karasu, nous avons décidé de contacter quelqu'un plus au fait des affaires de Hingashi que nous. Vous vous souvenez de Yuki, la princesse du clan Yatsurugi, je suppose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_002<tab>I am pleased to say that she was more than happy to lend her aid─doubtless in no small part due to your own efforts on her behalf.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_002<tab>Après avoir lu mon courrier, elle m'a im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment proposé de nous venir en aide, pour nous remercier d'avoir retrouvé les trésors de sa famille la dernière fois.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_003<tab>Judging from her words, she is quite eager to prove herself. Perhaps a bit <var 1A 02 /var>over<var 1A 01 /var>eager─I would ask you to keep an eye on her, lest she go running off into some sort of trouble.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_003<tab>D'après sa réponse, elle avait vraiment hâte d'en découdre. Votre princesse est un sacré garçon manqué, dites donc<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_004<tab>Which mayhap she already has, as she should have arrived hours ago. Perhaps she has simply gotten lost on the way, or stopped off for sushi and tea?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_004<tab>Peut-être, mais elle aurait déjà dû être arrivée depuis longtemps. Je commence à me demander si elle ne s'est pas perdue à Kugane en essayant de trouver notre point de rendez-vous...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_005<tab>Might the two of you be so kind as to search for her in my stead? Captain Jacke, see if she is not in the Rakuza District, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pray search the markets of Kogane Dori. I will remain here in case she has simply been delayed in her journey.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_005<tab>Il n'y a qu'une seule façon d'en avoir le cœur net<var 1D /var>: séparons-nous pour essayer de la trouver. Jacke, vous couvrirez le quartier de Rakuza, et <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> ira à Kogane-dori. Quant à moi, je vais rester ici pour attendre Yuki au cas où elle se montrerait.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_008<tab>I fear I have seen no sign of Princess Yuki. Pray search the markets of Kogane Dori while I wait for her here.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_008<tab>J'ai peur que la princesse Yuki se soit perdue à Kugane... J'ai demandé à Jacke de la chercher dans le quartier de Rakuza, pourriez-vous vous occuper de Kogane-dori<var 1D /var>? Je vais attendre ici au cas où elle aurait retrouvé son chemin.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Whatever are you doing here in Kugane? Not that I'm complaining, of course! I'm always happy to see the shinobi who helped bring prosperity back to my homeland!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je suis si heureuse de vous revoir<var 1D /var>! Grâce à votre aide précieuse, les conditions de vie à Inokuni se sont beaucoup améliorées. Ce sont tous les membres du clan Yatsurugi qui vous remercient.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_011<tab>Yes, thanks to you, my people are doing wonderfully. The only downside of it is that now I have to be a proper princess again. Akagi─he's my personal bodyguard now, you see─was none too happy when I told him I'd be heading to Kugane. In fact...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_011<tab>Ces derniers temps, mes devoirs de princesse m'obligent à rester enfermée la majeure partie du temps. Quand j'ai lu la lettre d'Oboro, j'ai sauté sur l'occasion<var 1D /var>! Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, devinez qui m'a suivie jusqu'à Kugane...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_012<tab>(-Frantic Male Voice-)Yuki! Princess Yuki, come back at once!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_012<tab>(-Voix d'Akagi-)Princeeesse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_013<tab>Oh, hells! He's on to me!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_013<tab>Grrr... Décidément, il est vraiment collant<var 1D /var>! S'il me met la main dessus, je serai obligée de rentrer au pays...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_014<tab>I just <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> to help you and Oboro in return for everything you did for me. Surely you understand, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Can you go find Akagi and just tell him that I─I don't know, that I hopped on a ship to Eorzea or something?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_014<tab>Écoutez, j'ai <var 1A 02 /var>vraiment<var 1A 01 /var> envie d'aider Oboro, et je n'ai pas fait tout ce chemin pour rien. S'il vous plaît, dites à Akagi que je suis partie... en Éorzéa, ça sera parfait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_18<tab>I can't go back home until I've done my duty for you and Oboro. Go tell Akagi that I hopped on a ship to Eorzea or something.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_18<tab>L'affaire d'Oboro a l'air pas<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nan<var 16 /var>te et j'ai <var 1A 02 /var>vraiment<var 1A 01 /var> envie de l'aider<var 1D /var>! Pourriez-vous dire à Akagi que je suis partie en Éorzéa, pour qu'il arrête de me coller<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Fancy meetin' you here. You're an awful long way from home, eh?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_020<tab>Tiens donc, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Quel hasard que nous nous croisions ici, à Kugane... Décidément, le monde est petit.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_021<tab>Speakin' of which, you haven't by chance seen Her Highness anywhere, have you? I caught her sneakin' out of the castle and followed her here to Kugane, but I seem to have lost her...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_021<tab>Dites, vous n'auriez pas vu passer la princesse<var 1D /var>? Elle s'est enfuie du château sans rien dire, mais j'ai réussi à la suivre jusqu'ici. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je viens de perdre sa trace...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_022<tab>E-Eorzea, you say!? Gods, what is the girl thinkin'? If anything happened to her, I'd never hear─
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_022<tab>C-comment, elle est partie en Éorzéa<var 1D /var>!? Oh non, pourquoi si loin<var 1D /var>? On dirait bien que je n'ai pas fini de courir...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_023<tab>But there's no time to lose─to the docks! Princess Yuki, wait for me! <var 1A 02 /var>Princess Yuki<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_AKAGI_000_023<tab>Bon, vous m'excuserez, mais j'ai une princesse à retrouver. Merci encore, et à la prochaine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_030<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and pray forgive me for asking you to lie on my behalf. I had half a mind to tell Akagi the truth, but then he might have offered to <var 1A 02 /var>help<var 1A 01 /var>, kami forbid.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_030<tab>Je vous dois une fière chandelle... Pour tout vous dire, c'est aussi pour le bien d'Akagi que je vous ai demandé de l'éloigner. Le connaissant, il aurait sûrement insisté pour nous aider si je lui avais expliqué la situation...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_031<tab>The man means well, but I hear that we face a most dangerous foe, and I simply didn't have the heart to place Akagi in danger. You understand, don't you? In any event, I do believe we've kept Oboro long enough.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_031<tab>J'ai bien compris que les hommes à qui nous avons affaire sont redoutables, et je n'ai aucunement envie de mettre Akagi en danger par mes caprices. Venez, allons rejoindre Oboro.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_035<tab>Well, if it isn't our favorite natty little lass...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_035<tab>Mesdames et Messieurs, inclinez-vous devant Sa Majesté le garçon manqué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_036<tab>You say I've met this man? I can't say he made much of an impression on me.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_036<tab>Qui est ce surineur<var 1D /var>? Sa tête me dit quelque chose...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_040<tab>Thank you for leading Her Highness here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Princess Yuki, thank you for making the journey to Kugane. Before we proceed, I would hear aught you might know of recent events in Hingashi.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vous remercie d'avoir retrouvé la princesse Yuki. Ne perdons pas de temps et entrons dans le vif du sujet, voulez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_041<tab>As you doubtless know, though Hingashi appears to outsiders to be a land at peace, beneath the surface rival warlords are ever scheming to undermine each other's power.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_041<tab>Comme vous me l'avez demandé, je me suis entretenue avec les autres seigneurs de Hingashi. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, personne n'a entendu parler du ninja extravagant que vous m'avez décrit dans votre lettre...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_042<tab>In that sense, it is entirely within the realm of possibility that one of them has employed a shinobi to gain a hidden advantage over his foes.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_042<tab>Mais pour tout vous dire, même si Hingashi est en paix, ses dirigeants ne se font pas vraiment confiance mu<var 16 /var>tuel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_043<tab>But this is merely speculation. Try as I might, I was unable to uncover any tangible evidence as to who might be behind these recent events.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_043<tab>Il est par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment possible qu'un seigneur ait engagé l'homme dont vous parlez et tente de le cacher, mais rien ne me permet de l'affirmer.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_044<tab>...I see. Thank you, Princess. And so it remains a mystery─what foul master does that treacherous crow serve?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_044<tab>Merci pour ces in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions, Princesse Yuki. Je me demande bien qui est le mystérieux employeur de ce fourbe de Karasu...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_045<tab>(-Familiar Voice-)Now, now, dim one. Is that any way to talk about a dear old friend?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_045<tab>(-Voix de Karasu-)Ouiii<var 1D /var>? On m'appeeelle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_046<tab>Karasu! You have some gall to call yourself my friend! What have you done with Tsubame and the others!?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_046<tab>Karasu<var 1D /var>! Comment oses-tu nous narguer de la sorte<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_047<tab>But what's this? The dim one is joined by one new companion after the next! Our hero is wounded! Was his friendship not enough? Why are the geniuses of the world so misunderstood!?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_047<tab>Oh, mais qui est donc cette blanche colombe<var 1D /var>? Tu en as de la chance, mon petit Oboro. Chaque fois qu'on se voit, tu as de nouveaux amis plus mignons les uns que les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_048<tab>Anyhow, I was hoping you'd ask! As a matter of fact, I have just the present for you. It's a game I like to call “kill-or-watch-your-friends-be-killed.” Do you like the name? I thought of it myself just now.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_048<tab>Ça ne pouvait pas mieux tomber. Plus nombreux on sera, plus le petit jeu que j'ai préparé sera amusant<var 1D /var>! Voyons, comment pourrais-je l'appeler... Je sais<var 1D /var>! “la renarde et les oisillons”, ça sonne bien, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_049<tab>The rules are really quite simple. Your precious swallow and the others are being held captive by the Garnet League on the Isle of Bekko. You simply need to march in, cut down Zakuro and her men, and free your companions from their shackles.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_049<tab>Vous allez voir, les règles sont très simples. D'abord, il faudra vous rendre sur l'île de Bekko, où vos petits amis sont retenus prisonniers par les Renards grenat. Là-bas, il vous suffira de vaincre Zakuro. Enfantin, je vous l'avais dit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_050<tab>Succeed, and I'll forget about the scroll, and you can all go marching happily back to Doma. Fail, and <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> get the scroll, and Zakuro bathes in your blood tonight.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_050<tab>En cas de victoire, vous gagnerez le droit de me remettre le parchemin, et vos amis seront libres comme l'air, ouiii<var 1D /var>! Si vous perdez, ça me fera beaucoup de peine... mais je n'aurai qu'à me baisser pour le ramasser sur vos cadavres, ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_051<tab>Ahahaha! Yes, I do believe there's something in it for everyone! I'll be watching from the shadows─do try to keep me entertained, won't you?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_051<tab>Bien sûr, je ne participerai pas à mon propre jeu, sinon ça serait de la triche<var 1D /var>! Mais ne vous en faites pas, je ne serai pas loin, pour m'assurer que tout le monde s'amuse, hé hé... Allez, au revoir mes mignooons. ♪

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_052<tab>Bah, does his villainy know no bounds!?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_052<tab>Grrr... Il croit que c'est amusant...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_053<tab>I'm not keen on agreein' to those terms, but it don't seem we've much choice in the matter...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_053<tab>Désolé de te décevoir, Oboro, mais je ne pense pas que nous ayons le choix...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_054<tab>If it's a fight he wants, it's a fight he'll get! Together, we can take those Garnet curs─what do you say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_054<tab>Moi aussi, je veux participer<var 1D /var>! Enfin de l'action, c'est exactement pour ça que je me suis échappée. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous en êtes aussi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_055<tab>Forgive me, my friends. If only I had been quicker to unravel Karasu's schemes, I would not have to place you in danger like this. Still, it heartens me to know you stand with us.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_055<tab>Princesse Yuki, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vous suis pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant. Si seulement j'avais été plus attentif aux manigances de Karasu, tout ça ne serait pas arrivé...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_056<tab>Same holds true for me, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. While I'm not proud we let that rook get the better of us, I feel a lot safer knowin' a dimber damber like yerself is on our side. Let's get Underfoot and V'kebbe out o' there right quick-like.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_056<tab>J'aimerais vous remercier, moi aussi. Au départ, cette affaire ne concernait que la guilde des surineurs, et c'est à cause de moi si nous en sommes là...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_057<tab>Ever since the elders told me my presence was not needed in the village, I have struggled to find meaning in my daily existence. For whom do I fight? For what greater purpose?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_057<tab>Dire que je m'inquiétais d'avoir été écarté des affaires de mon village, et appréhendais déjà d'affronter la solitude en Éorzéa pour le restant de mes jours...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_058<tab>Now, I have found an answer─it is for you, my friends. You, who have stood beside me in the darkest of times. You, who have shown me that there is strength inside me that even I had long forgotten. You, who─
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_058<tab>J'avais un peu trop vite oublié que je vous avais, vous, mes amis. Vous comptez tous énormément pour moi, et je voudrais vous dire que...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_059<tab>This is no time for prittle prattle, lad! Or haven't ye noticed the princess has already hopped the twig? Dust off yer beater cases and let's move!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_059<tab>Oui, tu nous le diras plus tard<var 1D /var>! La princesse garçon manqué est déjà partie, il faut qu'on se dépêche pour la rattraper<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_060<tab>The man speaks true. Yes, we must be strong of both body and mind if we hope to prevail. To the Isle of Bekko, where our friends await us!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_060<tab>Je, euh... Bon, en route pour l'île de Bekko<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_063<tab>The lad's not quite all there in the head, is he?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_063<tab>Il ne serait pas un peu mou du bulbe, le Oboro<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_064<tab>Let's show those dishonorable Garnet dogs what for!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_064<tab>Quand est-ce qu'on y va<var 1D /var>? Je commence à avoir des fourmis dans les jambes, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_065<tab>Little to my surprise, it would seem Karasu has alerted our foe to our presence. Let us proceed with caution. There is no telling what manner of treachery the crow has in store for us.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_065<tab>Nous n'avons pas le choix, il nous faut entrer dans le jeu de Karasu. Attention à Zakuro et ses hommes, nul doute qu'ils voudront laver les affronts que nous leur avons fait subir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Find your friends!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Trouvez vos camarades<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Rescue V'kebbe!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Libérez V'kebbe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_3<tab>Rescue Perimu Haurimu!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_3<tab>Libérez Perimu Haurimu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_4<tab>Defeat Zakuro!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_4<tab>Vainquez les Renards grenat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_5<tab>Find Perimu Haurimu!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_QIB_001_TODO_5<tab>Trouvez Perimu Haurimu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_MEMO_000_100<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_MEMO_000_100<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_000_001_001<tab>Let us keep to the shadows for now. I would avoid any bloodshed that is not absolutely necessary.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_000_001_001<tab>Nous avons tout intérêt à économiser nos forces pour affronter Zakuro. Restez bien <var 1A 02 /var>dissimulés<var 1A 01 /var> jusqu'à ce que nous trouvions où sont séquestrés nos amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Oh, Oboro, you're no fun at <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var>! Can't I cut down just <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var>? I promise he won't make a peep!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Vous êtes sûrs qu'on ne peut pas s'amuser un peu...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Stow yer blade, lass. 'Least until we know our friends are safe.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Non, c'est trop dangereux. Notre priorité est de retrouver V'kebbe et Perimu.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_001_010<tab>Curses! They're on to us! We've no choice but to fight!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_001_010<tab>Zut, ils nous ont repérés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>It's V'kebbe! Quickly, now! Make short work of the sentries and free her from her ropes!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>Regardez, c'est V'kebbe<var 1D /var>! Débarrassons-nous des bandits pour la libérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_VKEBBE_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_VKEBBE_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>To the shadows again, friends! Master Underfoot must be around here somewhere...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>Allez, tout le monde se <var 1A 02 /var>dissimule<var 1A 01 /var> pour avancer. Il nous faut retrouver Perimu Haurimu, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab><sniff> <sniff> Something smells so <var 1A 02 /var>familiar<var 1A 01 /var>. Did I say I'd stay out of this fight? Oops, I lied!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Je ressens une présence familière... Laissons quelques makibishi.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Blast it all! You'll pay for your treachery, Karasu!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Grrr... Bien sûr, Karasu a menti lorsqu'il a dit qu'il resterait à l'écart<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>My friends! I will handle these foes! Keep to the shadows!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Je m'en charge. Continuez à avancer, sans oublier de vous <var 1A 02 /var>dissimuler<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>Stow it, Oboro, before─bleedin' hells, there goes our cover!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>Pas si fort, on va se faire repérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>F-Forgive me, my friends...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>D-désolé...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>Finally, some action! Feel my blade, you honorless dogs!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>Battons-nous tous ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_BATTLETALK_003_010<tab>Aw, is that all of them? I was just getting warmed up!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_BATTLETALK_003_010<tab>Ceux-là ne nous embêteront plus.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_BATTLETALK_003_011<tab>Well, I s'pose there's no point in hidin' no more...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_BATTLETALK_003_011<tab>Bon, plus la peine de se cacher, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_012<tab>Good work, my friends. Our companions await us. Let us move quickly!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_003_012<tab>Allez, on continue à avancer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>It's Master Underfoot! Quickly, dispatch of the guards!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Voilà Perimu Haurimu<var 1D /var>! Débarrassons-nous de ceux-là pour le libérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_PERIMUHAURIMU_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>Thank ye kindly, friends. Those ropes stung somethin' fierce.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_PERIMUHAURIMU_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>Merci de m'avoir sauvé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_000_066<tab>Ye've got more courage than sense to come this far. Heh...if we fought on the same side, I could see myself gettin' to like you. But we serve another master, and he just so happens to be a demandin' one.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_000_066<tab>Vous vous êtes bien payé ma tête, la dernière fois. J'ai pas apprécié, et mon client non plus. Il est furieux, maintenant...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_000_067<tab>Don't give me that look. We've all got to make a livin', an' this is the best way we know how. Now draw your blades! Zakuro'll bathe in yer lifeblood <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((this night)) ((this day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((this day)) ((this night)) /var>)) /var>!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_000_067<tab>Vous l'avez compris, la mort est la seule issue de ce combat. Préparez-vous à une pluie de sang<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Hear me, men? Cut down the rats where they stand!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Je vais vous écraser, cloportes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Be strong, friends! Zakuro is a formidable opponent, but we must prevail!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>À nous de combattre les Renards grenat pour libérer Tsubame<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Must your battles always be so <var 1A 02 /var>boring<var 1A 01 /var>? Here's a little something to heat things up!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>On dirait qu'il manque un petit quelque chose pour que tout le monde s'amuse <var 1A 02 /var>vraiment<var 1A 01 /var>... Laissez-moi vous donner un petit coup de main, ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Curses! Beware Karasu's katon, friends! Keep a distance from each other!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Attention à Karasu, prenez vos distances avec ses attaques<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_005<tab>It took ye bloody long enough! Time to earn yer keep!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_005<tab>Occupez-vous <var 08 E905 ((de la)) ((du)) /var> <var 08 E4E90501 ((<var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((Race)) E94802 /var>)) /var>, je me charge des autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_006<tab>What do I pay you for, anyway? Cut them down, ye bloody wretches, or I'll skewer you where ye stand!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_006<tab><var 08 E905 ((La)) ((Le)) /var> <var 08 E4E90501 ((<var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((Race)) E94802 /var>)) /var> est à vous pendant que je m'occupe de ceux-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_005_007<tab>I'm <var 1A 02 /var>baaa-aaack<var 1A 01 /var>! Did you miss me?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_005_007<tab>Alors mon petit Oboro, on s'amuse bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_008<tab>Like a dagger in my back. Spread out, friends, and stand clear of the flames!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_008<tab>Grrr, le revoilà... Attention, séparez-vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_009<tab>Show the rats no mercy! We will bathe the hills of Bekko in their blood!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_009<tab>Occupez-vous <var 08 E905 ((de la)) ((du)) /var> <var 08 E4E90501 ((<var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((Race)) E94802 /var>)) /var> pendant que je fais tomber une pluie de sang<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_010<tab>Nnngh! Is the blood I bathe in...my own...?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_ZAKURO_BATTLETALK_005_010<tab>Moi, vaincue par ces cloportes...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_005_011<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_BATTLETALK_005_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_012<tab>We have...failed. Tsubame, forgive me...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_BATTLETALK_005_012<tab>Nous avons... perdu...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_070<tab>Blades awhirling through the air! Blood watering the fields! Shinobi fighting side by side, all for the sake of their dear <var 1A 02 /var>friends<var 1A 01 /var>! Could there be a more moving sight? Our hero is moved to tears...or <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_070<tab>(-Voix de Karasu-)Que c'est beau, l'amitié... Vous êtes vraiment touchants, mais toutes les bonnes choses ont une fin.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_071<tab>But do not worry. As promised, I'll return your precious swallow with nary a feather out of place─once you hand over the scroll, of course.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_071<tab>On a tous bien ri, mais le jeu s'arrête ici. Le parchemin, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_072<tab>What foolery is this, Karasu!? We played your little game, and we won, did we not? Are you not a man of your word!?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_072<tab>Tu n'es qu'un lâche, Karasu<var 1D /var>! On a gagné à ton “jeu” stupide, alors relâche tout de suite Tsubame<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_073<tab>Oh, my poor, stupid Oboro! How dim can one man <var 1A 02 /var>get<var 1A 01 /var>? Didn't anyone ever tell you that promises are made to be broken─<var 1A 02 /var>especially<var 1A 01 /var> mine. Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_073<tab>Mon petit Oboro, comme toujours, tu es tellement naïf... Dans un jeu, les règles sont faites pour être enfreintes, ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Mais c'est peut-être trop dur à comprendre pour le ninja modèle que tu es...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_074<tab>Now, hand over the scroll, and quickly now! I don't particularly enjoy killing my dear friends, but that's never stopped me before.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_074<tab>Bon, on a assez perdu de temps comme ça. Si tu ne me donnes pas le parchemin tout de suite, il risque d'arriver des choses <var 1A 02 /var>très<var 1A 01 /var> désagréables à la petite hirondelle...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_075<tab>O-Oboro! The scroll...!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_075<tab>Oboro, non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_076<tab>Very good, dim one! Yes, I daresay you've played your role to perfection. Fly away home, little swallow─we've had enough fun for the day.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_076<tab>Tu vois, tu sais être raisonnable, quand tu veux<var 1D /var>! Comme je suis de bonne humeur, je te rends ta chère Tsubame.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_077<tab>(-Imposing Shinobi-)Incompetent fools, the lot of you. How long do you intend to keep me waiting for what is rightfully mine?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_077<tab>(-Ninja mystérieux-)Bons à rien de rônin... Il leur en a fallu, du temps...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_078<tab>Lord Hanzo! You couldn't have come at a better time. You'll be happy to know I have <var 1A 02 /var>just<var 1A 01 /var> what you've been looking for. Behold!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_078<tab>Maître, j'ai le parchemin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_079<tab>Our hero has truly outdone himself this time! At long last, the ancient secrets of Hingan ninjutsu will be his! Do tell me, Lord Hanzo─when will training begin? L-Lord Hanzo!?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_079<tab>Hé hé... Voilà comment je gagne mon aller simple pour Hingashi, la terre d'origine du ninjutsu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_080<tab>Aieeeeeeeeeeee!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_KARASU_000_080<tab>Hé, ça brûle... Ouille, ouille<var 1D /var>! Aaaah, nooooon<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_081<tab>(-Imposing Shinobi-)Silence, whelp! The bastard get of Sasuke the Shamed deserve naught but a quick death.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_081<tab>(-Ninja mystérieux-)Pauvre pitre, ridicule jusqu'au bout. Si ton maître te voyait...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_082<tab>(-Imposing Shinobi-)Well, well... A brood of Doman dogs who would call themselves shinobi. You stand before Hanzo the Hidden, twelfth lord of the Kagekakushi clan─and you should consider yourself fortunate that I do not cut you down where you stand.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_082<tab>(-Ninja mystérieux-)Vous aussi, vous êtes des élèves du traître Sasuke<var 1D /var>? Je me présente, Hanzo 12e du nom, chef du clan Kagekakushi de Hingashi, à l'origine de toutes les techniques de ninjutsu.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_084<tab>And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> would call your petty tricks ninjutsu? I spit on your ninjutsu. Your very existence brings dishonor to every <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> shinobi who has ever lived. Yes, those of <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> clan─the original and true practitioners of the art.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_084<tab>En temps normal, il serait de ma res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té d'éliminer les disciples d'un renégat... Mais vous avez de la chance, d'autres affaires plus urgentes m'attendent.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_085<tab>Be thankful that I have more important matters to attend to today. Enjoy what little remains of your miserable lives─your time will come, and before you know it.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_HANZO_000_085<tab>Profitez-en, car je ne serai pas aussi clément la prochaine fois.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_086<tab>Forgive me, my friends... Pray give me a moment to take in all we just saw...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_086<tab>Tout s'est passé si vite... Karasu est... mort<var 1D /var>? Et Sasuke, notre maître, serait... un renégat<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_090<tab>I do not know where to even start. Karasu, killed off before our very eyes? The forbidden mudra in the hands of this Hanzo, who claims to hail from the clan who founded our art, and who harbors a grudge against Master Sasuke─and, in turn, us─for reasons I can scarce begin to understand?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_090<tab>Nous avons réussi à sauver nos camarades, mais la technique d'invocation interdite est tombée aux mains de ce Hanzo... Je n'ose pas imaginer ce qui pourrait se passer s'il l'utilisait à de mauvaises fins...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_091<tab>Though it may be small comfort, we can take heart in one matter. In truth, the scroll Hanzo now holds is but one half of the whole─alone, it is all but worthless.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_091<tab>Sois tranquille, Oboro. Le parchemin que Hanzo a en sa possession est in<var 16 /var>uti<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble en l'état. En fait, il existe une autre partie, sans laquelle la technique d'invocation est incomplète.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_092<tab>The other half is tucked safely away in our village, far from Hanzo's peering eye. It is a secret known only to the elders, entrusted to me by the old hermit before I took my leave.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_092<tab>Cette autre moitié est cachée en lieu sûr, dans notre village... Seuls les anciens sont censés être au courant de ce secret, mais le plus vieux d'entre eux a jugé bon de m'en parler.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_093<tab>Is that so? Hmph. I would have appreciated if someone could have shared that knowledge with me as well. The old hermit always did like you better...for some reason.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_093<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? Tant mieux, dans ce cas. Une chance que tu aies toujours été la favorite du doyen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_094<tab>Still, I do not expect this Hanzo to give up easily. Whatever the true nature of the grudge he holds against the founder of our village, it seems to nigh border on obsession.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_094<tab>Malgré tout, je n'arrive pas à y croire... Sasuke, le fondateur de notre village, serait un traître<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_095<tab>Our adversary claims to hail from the Kagekakushi clan. Princess Yuki, are you familiar with the name?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_095<tab>Princesse, vous qui êtes de Hingashi, avez-vous déjà entendu parler de ce Hanzo et du clan Kagekakushi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_096<tab>If I remember the histories correctly, they achieved great renown for their exploits in battle during the Age of Strife. It was said that a single Kagekakushi fought with the strength and skill of a thousand lesser shinobi.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_096<tab>Oui, c'est une faction de ninja d'élite qui s'est rendu célèbre dans mon pays à l'époque des guerres intestines. Mais je suis la première surprise d'entendre qu'elle existe encore...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_097<tab>...Until one day when a vengeful warlord razed their village to the ground, slaughtering even wives and babes. The Kagekakushi on the battlefield, too, disappeared one after the next. An inglorious end, by any measure.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_097<tab>Je pensais que tous les ninja de ce clan avaient été éliminés lorsque l'armée d'un certain seigneur avait violemment ravagé leur village, n'épargnant ni femmes ni enfants...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_098<tab>If this Hanzo is truly a descendant of the clan, it would stand to reason that he would seek revenge against those who betrayed his ancestors. But how this is connected to Sasuke─I cannot say.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_098<tab>Si Hanzo est ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment un survivant des Kagekakushi, il doit forcément chercher à se venger des descendants du seigneur qui a exterminé sa faction. Cela pourrait provoquer de graves troubles en Hingashi...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_099<tab>But if there's one thing I know, it's that I'm not going to just stand by while this Hanzo plunges our nation into another age of war! I will return home and see if there is any more knowledge of the Kagekakushi to be had.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_YUKI_000_099<tab>Je dois absolument regagner mon pays le plus vite possible pour essayer d'en savoir plus sur le clan Kagekakushi. Je vous tiendrai au courant si j'apprends quoi que ce soit qui concerne Hanzo et le parchemin.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_100<tab>Thank you, Princess. We are counting on you.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_100<tab>Merci, Princesse Yuki.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_101<tab>For our part, we should return to Yanxia. Once Hanzo realizes that he only possesses half of the knowledge he seeks, he is like to turn an eye to our village. We must warn the elders.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_101<tab>Tsubame, rentrons nous aussi. Si Hanzo apprend qu'il ne peut utiliser la technique d'invocation, il est possible qu'il attaque notre village pour obtenir la seconde moitié du parchemin.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_102<tab>If it's all the same, I reckon I'll join ye. I'm not keen on showin' my face in Limsa till I've got the goods I came for in my daddles.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_102<tab>Je vous accompagne. Mais attention, n'allez pas croire que c'est de bon cœur. On m'a confié une mission, et j'ai bien l'intention de récupérer ce parchemin pour la remplir.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_103<tab>That said, someone needs to see to it that all's bob back at home...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_103<tab>Par contre, mon absence à la guilde commence à durer...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_104<tab>Underfoot, V'kebbe. Can I count on ye to keep things in order till I've seen to business here?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_104<tab>V'kebbe, Perimu, vous rentrez à Limsa Lominsa. Je vous confie nos affaires durant mon absence.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_105<tab>Aye aye, Cap'n! Consider it done!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_105<tab>Pas de problème, Chef<var 1D /var>! Vous pouvez compter sur nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_VKEBBE_000_106<tab>Just hurry back, will ye? I'll make sure there's a Bismarck special with yer name on it.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_VKEBBE_000_106<tab>Je te mets un sandwich à la Bismarrrck de côté pour ton retour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_107<tab>Bugger me if this journey hasn't been one surprise after the next─and somethin' tells me the best is yet to come. Ye'll be joinin' us, won't ye, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? For ol' times' sake?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_107<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'espère que tu en es<var 1D /var>? Après tout ce chemin parcouru ensemble, tu ne peux pas nous laisser tomber<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_108<tab>I cannot thank you enough, friend. The journey to Yanxia is a long one. After we arrive, let us rest up in the village of Namai.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_108<tab>Merci à tous, votre aide sera sans aucun doute très précieuse. Sur ce, en route pour Yanxia<var 1D /var>! Nous irons d'abord jusqu'à Namai, où nous ferons une petite halte, avant de regagner mon village.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_109<tab>My long-awaited homecoming, for the first time since I left in pursuit of Karasu. Karasu...have you truly left this world for good?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_109C'est la première fois que j'y retourne depuis notre confrontation avec Gekkai.
Karasu... Je n'arrive pas à croire que tu nous aies quittés...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_115<tab>I've seen many a sleepy fishin' village in my day, but this might be the sleepiest...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_115<tab>Décidément, je me demande jusqu'où cette histoire va nous mener. Voilà qu'il y a deux parchemins, maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_116<tab>Oboro has seemed quite pensive since arriving here in Namai. It would seem that this homecoming weighs heavily on his mind...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_TSUBAME_000_116<tab>J'entends souvent Oboro soupirer, depuis que nous sommes arrivés à Yanxia...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_100_115<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_100_115<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_120<tab>Tsubame and I will first make the journey to the village alone. Forgive me, but the elders are not like to smile on the sudden arrival of outsiders.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_120<tab>Je dois vous demander d'attendre ici pendant que Tsubame et moi regagnons notre village pour expliquer la situation aux anciens. Les étrangers n'y sont pas admis, c'est la règle.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_121<tab>We will report on all that we saw in Hingashi, and gather what wisdom we can. Pray wait for us here. We will return as soon as we are able.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_121<tab>Ne vous en faites pas, nous reviendrons vous prévenir dès qu'il y aura du nouveau.

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_122<tab>I do not ask for a hero's welcome, but... <sigh> Well, I suppose there is no putting it off any longer...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_OBORO_000_122<tab>J'ai un de ces tracs... Entre la gravité de la situation et mon mensonge pour ne pas rentrer au village, je me demande quel accueil on va me réserver...

source: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_123<tab>Seems we're on our own for the time bein'. Reckon I can find some bene bingo an' a couple of rum doxies in this place? Just havin' a bit of an amuse─what with this Hanzo on the prowl, it's best we both keep our stabbers sharpened.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN650_02950_JACKE_000_123<tab>Ça m'étonnerait qu'on revoie Hanzo de sitôt. Si j'étais toi, j'en profiterais pour vaquer à mes occupations. Tu es toujours très <var 08 E905 ((occupée)) ((occupé)) /var>, non<var 1D /var>? Ne te fais pas de souci pour moi, je ne bouge pas d'ici.
